data_table.description: Pulmonary Function Test - Diffusion Capacity Test, Offspring Cohort Exam 8. Data collected include diffusion capacity, acceptable efforts for diffusion, alveolar volume and inspired volume.

variable.name: dsb1_8_1
variable.comment: STPD in the units stands for: Standard Temperature and Pressure, Dry

variable.name: dsb2_8_1
variable.comment: STPD in the units stands for: Standard Temperature and Pressure, Dry
variable.value: unknown or only had one acceptable effort

variable.name: dsb3_8_1
variable.comment: STPD in the units stands for: Standard Temperature and Pressure, Dry
variable.value: unknown or only had one or two acceptable efforts

variable.name: dva1_8_1
variable.description: Diffusion Capacity per Unit Alveolar Volume - 1st Acceptable Effort
variable.comment: STPD in the units stands for: Standard Temperature and Pressure, Dry

variable.name: dva2_8_1
variable.description: Diffusion Capacity per Unit Alveolar Volume - 2nd Acceptable Effort
variable.comment: STPD in the units stands for: Standard Temperature and Pressure, Dry
variable.value: unknown or only had one acceptable effort

variable.name: dva3_8_1
variable.description: Diffusion Capacity per Unit Alveolar Volume - 3rd Acceptable Effort
variable.comment: STPD in the units stands for: Standard Temperature and Pressure, Dry
variable.value: unknown or only had one or two acceptable efforts

variable.name: va1_8_1
variable.comment: BTPS in units stands for: Body Temperature and Ambient Pressure, Saturated with Water Vapor

variable.name: va2_8_1
variable.comment: BTPS in units stands for: Body Temperature and Ambient Pressure, Saturated with Water Vapor
variable.value: unknown or only had one acceptable effort

variable.name: va3_8_1
variable.comment: BTPS in units stands for: Body Temperature and Ambient Pressure, Saturated with Water Vapor
variable.value: unknown or only had one or two acceptable efforts

variable.name: vi2_8_1
variable.value: unknown or only had one acceptable effort

variable.name: vi3_8_1
variable.value: unknown or only had one or two acceptable efforts

variable.name: nad_8_1
variable.description: Number of Acceptable Efforts for Diffusion
